page.title: 09A WEEKEND IN MY LIFE
page.content: and I get my piano books together ready for my{piano lesson.}When we are all ready we drive to Leominster to the swimming pool.My sister has her lesson first so I watch her while I am waiting for Marianne,Catherine,Isabel and Anna to arrive.When they arrive we get changed and wait for our instructor to tell us he is ready. There are three groups in each lesson: the backstroke group,the breaststroke group and the front crawl group which I am in with Marianne,Catherine and Isabel because we are not very good at it.We all think our instructor works us too hard but we are trying to practise our Gold Challenge. When the{swimming lesson}is over I have to get changed quickly because I have my piano lesson straight away.My sister has her piano lesson before me and our lessons last half an hour.I am
